creditline: The Anne and Hadlai Hull Fund
description: floral repouse design in 4 horizontal bands; openwork floral design at largest point; 2 rows of bells; crownlike openwork finial
markings: On stamp, on top of lowest floral row: [GS]; Dianakopf (Diana head), to left of first stamp
provenance: (William Gross, Tel Aviv, Israel); Purchased by the MIA in 1998.
title: Rimmonim (Torah finial) (one of a pair)
